fields.name: base
organisations/staff_member/invite
fields.description: The email that is sent to partner staff member when he have been registered in the system.
fields.subject: eTools {% if environment %}{{ environment }} {% endif %}- Invitation
fields.content:
Dear Colleague,

You have been invited to the eTools. To get access to our system follow link.

{{ login_link }}

eTools Team

fields.name: audit/engagement/submit_to_auditor
fields.description: Email that send to auditor when engagement have been created.
fields.subject: [Auditor Portal] ACCESS GRANTED for {{ engagement.engagement_type }}, {{ engagement.unique_id }}

fields.name: audit/engagement/reported_by_auditor
fields.description: Email that send when auditor fill engagement's report.
fields.subject: {{ engagement.auditor_firm }} has completed the final report for {{ engagement.engagement_type }}, {{ engagement.unique_id }}

fields.name: audit/engagement/action_point_assigned
fields.subject: [eTools] ACTION POINT ASSIGNED to {{ action_point.person_responsible }}

fields.name: email_auth/token/login
fields.description: The email that is sent to user to login without password.
fields.subject: eTools Access Token
fields.content:
Dear {{ recipient }},

Please click on this link to sign in to eTools portal: 

{{ login_link }}

Thank you.

fields.name: audit/staff_member/invite
fields.subject: UNICEF Auditor Portal Access
fields.content:
Dear {{ staff_member }},

UNICEF has assingned a {{ engagement.engagement_type }} to you. Please click link to gain access to the UNICEF Auditor Portal.

{{ login_link }}

eTools Team

fields.name: tpm/visit/assign
fields.description: Visit assigned. TPM should be notified.
fields.subject: [TPM Portal] TPM Visit Request for {{ visit.partners }}; {{ visit.reference_number }}
fields.html_content:
{% extends "email-templates/base" %} {% block content %} Dear {{ visit.tpm_partner }},

UNICEF is requesting a Monitoring/Verification Visit for {{ visit.partners }}.

Please refer below for additional information.

{% for activity in visit.tpm_activities %} PD/SSFA/ToR: {{ activity.intervention }}
CP Output {{ activity.cp_output|default:"unassigned" }}
Locations: {{ activity.locations }}
Section: {{ activity.section }}

{% endfor %}
Please click this link for additional information and documents relatied to the visit: {{ visit.object_url }}

Thank you. {% endblock %}

fields.name: tpm/visit/reject
fields.description: TPM rejected visit. Notify focal points.
fields.subject: {{ visit.tpm_partner }} has rejected the Monitoring/Verification Visit Request {{ visit.reference_number }}

fields.name: tpm/visit/accept
fields.description: TPM accepted visit. Notify focal points & PME.
fields.subject: {{ visit.tpm_partner }} has accepted the Monitoring/Verification Visit Request {{ visit.reference_number }}

fields.name: tpm/visit/report
fields.description: TPM finished with visit report.  Notify PME & focal points.
fields.subject: {{ visit.tpm_partner }} has submited the final report for {{ visit.reference_number }}
fields.html_content:
{% extends "email-templates/base" %} {% block content %} Dear {{ recipient }},

{{ visit.tpm_partner }} has submited the final report for the Monitoring/Verification visit{% if partnerships %} requested for {{ visit.interventions }}{% endif %}.
Please refer below for additional information.

{% for activity in visit.tpm_activities %} PD/SSFA/ToR: {{ activity.intervention }}
CP Output {{ activity.cp_output|default:"unassigned" }}
Locations: {{ activity.locations }}
Section: {{ activity.section }}

{% endfor %}
Please click this link to view the final report: {{ visit.object_url }} and take the appropriate action {Accept/Request for more information}

Thank you. {%endblock %}

fields.name: tpm/visit/report_rejected
fields.subject: Request for more information on the Final report for the Monitoring/Verification Visit {{ visit.reference_number }}
fields.html_content:
{% extends "email-templates/base" %} {% block content %} Dear {{ recipient }},

UNICEF has requested additional information on the final report submited for the Monitoring/Verification visit to Implementing Partner{% if visit.multiple_tpm_activities %}s{% endif %} {{ visit.partners }}.
Please refer below for additional information.

{% for activity in visit.tpm_activities %} PD/SSFA/ToR: {{ activity.intervention }}
CP Output {{ activity.cp_output|default:"unassigned" }}
Locations: {{ activity.locations }}
Section: {{ activity.section }}

{% endfor %}
Please click this link to view the additional information/clarifications requested: {{ visit.object_url }}

Thank you. {%endblock %}

fields.name: tpm/visit/approve_report_tpm
fields.subject: UNICEF approved Final report for the Monitoring/Verification Visit {{ visit.reference_number }}
fields.html_content:
{% extends "email-templates/base" %} {% block content %} Dear {{ recipient }},

UNICEF approved final report submited for the Monitoring/Verification visit to Implementing Partner{% if visit.multiple_tpm_activities %}s{% endif %} {{ visit.partners }}.
Please refer below for additional information.

{% for activity in visit.tpm_activities %} PD/SSFA/ToR: {{ activity.intervention }}
CP Output {{ activity.cp_output|default:"unassigned" }}
Locations: {{ activity.locations }}
Section: {{ activity.section }}

{% endfor %}
Please click this link for additional information: {{ visit.object_url }}

Thank you. {%endblock %}

fields.name: tpm/visit/approve_report
fields.description: Report was approved. Notify UNICEF focal points.
fields.subject: UNICEF approved Final report for the Monitoring/Verification Visit {{ visit.reference_number }}
fields.html_content:
{% extends "email-templates/base" %} {% block content %} Dear {{ recipient }},

UNICEF approved final report submited for the Monitoring/Verification visit to Implementing Partner{% if visit.multiple_tpm_activities %}s{% endif %} {{ visit.partners }}.
Please refer below for additional information.

{% for activity in visit.tpm_activities %} PD/SSFA/ToR: {{ activity.intervention }}
CP Output {{ activity.cp_output|default:"unassigned" }}
Locations: {{ activity.locations }}
Section: {{ activity.section }}

{% endfor %}
Please click this link for additional information: {{ visit.object_url }}

Thank you. {%endblock %}

fields.name: tpm/visit/action_point_assigned
fields.description: Action point assigned to visit. Person responsible should be notified.
fields.subject: [eTools] ACTION POINT ASSIGNED to {{ action_point.person_responsible }}
fields.html_content:
{% extends "email-templates/base" %} {% block content %} Dear {{ action_point.person_responsible.first_name }},

{{ action_point.author.get_full_name }} has assigned you an action point related to Monitoring/Verification Visit {{ visit.reference_number }}.
Implementing Partner{% if visit.multiple_tpm_activities %}s{% endif %} {{ visit.partners }}.
Please refer below for additional information.

{% for activity in visit.tpm_activities %} PD/SSFA/ToR: {{ activity.intervention }}
CP Output {{ activity.cp_output|default:"unassigned" }}
Locations: {{ activity.locations }}
Section: {{ activity.section }}

{% endfor %} Please click this link for additional information: {{ visit.object_url }}

Thank you. {%endblock %}
